column4: eek! can anyone tell me what to do at this point? im using netboot to install 5.10.. however it says that it cant resolve mirror us.archive.ubuntu.. i went to the option to enter the mirror manually, and im not familar with whatever text editor this is

it says it is in Ex mode, and to type visual for normal mode
